subsections.title: Product Groups
subsections.content: The product portfolio is divided into three different groups: basecoats, topcoats, and thinners.
subsections.author: omarsawani@gmail.com

subsections.title: Basecoats
subsections.content:
The most important function of the basecoats is to provide the coated steel surface with active protection against corrosion. This protective action is based on the sacrificial characteristic of zinc which is present in all basecoats.

ElementMgAlZnFeNiCuAgPtAu
Standard potential E° (V)-2.37-1.66-0.76-0.44-0.250.340.801.201.50
subsections.author: omarsawani@gmail.com

subsections.title: Topcoats
subsections.content:
With a topcoat, various properties of the coating system can be achieved:

  • Setting a defined coefficient of friction;
  • Sealing of surfaces;
  • Resistance to chemicals;
  • Abrasion resistance;
  • Color

Applying a topcoat can significantly increase the durability of the underlying basecoat.
subsections.author: omarsawani@gmail.com

subsections.title: Naming
subsections.content:
Numbers and lubricant information are added to the registered product names DELTA®-TONE, DELTA®-SEAL and DELTA-LUBE® for exact identification of the product.

The DELTA-PROTEKT® series products are clearly designated by letter combinations and a sequence of numbers:

  • K: Cathodic corrosion protection
  • V: Sealing
  • M: Modifier
  • L: Solvent-based/solvent
  • H: Water-based

The subsequent numbers indicate the functional system to which the product belongs. For products that contain a lubricant additive, the letters 'GZ' are added to the product name.
subsections.author: omarsawani@gmail.com

subsections.title: Product Series
subsections.content:
The product series provides details on different products and their characteristics.

ProductTypeCharacteristics
DELTA-PROTEKT® KL 120Zinc Flake BasecoatCathodic protection, solvent-based

DELTA-PROTEKT® VH 301.1 GZTopcoat with LubricantInorganic, water-based with lubricant additive
